Meshing Strategies

MarS provides several mesh classes to handle orientation sampling in EPR simulations, ranging from isotropic powder averages to single-crystal and axially symmetric cases.

Available Mesh Types

  • Powder Mesh: DelaunayMesh

    • Usage
  • Axial Mesh: AxialMeshNeighbour

    • Usage
    • Mathematical Notes
  • Crystal Mesh: CrystalMesh
